name: Life of the Party (sirsnowy7)
description:
Race against the clock to save the party from total devastation. Made for Ludum Dare compo 46. Controls are on start screen. Keyboard/controller are supported.

Art and fonts from Kenney.nl and Chrisblue (https://opengameart.org/content/type7r-spritefont), music from Johan Brodd (https://opengameart.org/content/metropolis-rush)
